The gloves also have 2.5 inch knitted cuff that can be tucked underneath your girl's jacket and coat sleeves to prevent snow from getting inside the gloves.

HEARTS, FLOWERS AND MORE FOR THE SNOW! Your girls will love playing in the snow wearing these warm and high quality hearts, flowers or laser printed gloves. The gloves have a grippy palm area as well as grippers on the thumbs and fingers, which makes them perfect for outdoors winter activities such skiing and ice skating. The gloves are also designed with curved fingers and palm for better comfort and ergonomics.

The hook and loop closure allows for adjustability and a tight, secure fit to keep the gloves on. These are great for active girls that enjoy playing in the snow, and they are also well suited for little kids since they are easy to wear.
